title: Drawing, "Retrieval of Books from the Tomb of Numa, Sala di Numa Pompilius, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1802–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, lower center oval: sono trovate le due casse o tomba/ di numa
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Civilian and soldier take books from two sarcophagi at left,while another officer reads book in center; groups of soldiers stand on either side in middle plane. Distant view of mountainous country with walled town.
